doc.previous: Maine and Nebraska each allow for their electoral votes to be split between candidates In both states two electoral votes are awarded to the winner of the statewide race and one electoral vote is awarded to the winner of each congressional district The following table records the official presidential vote tallies for Maine and Nebraska s congressional districts 236 237
doc.after: Red font color denotes states won by Republican John McCain blue denotes those won by Democrat Barack Obama  States districts where the margin of victory was under 6 103 electoral votes  States districts where margin of victory was more than 6 but less than 10 58 electoral votes
